name: Jelly Shooter Arcade
description:
Jelly shooter arcade is a game made during a two weeks jam.

It's a dead ops arcade like in which you incarnate a minion who as to fight against a wave of ennemies. With a top view to be able to see everything at once, you will shoot jelly to make the ennemies disappear in a * poof *.  You will be able to collect objects and make your game experience funnier with new battling stuff.

Because this game represents characters which already exists, this game will only be free and for the sole purpose of having fun.

Don't forget to turn the sound on while you play ! :)

Crew :

Devs : FLOT Léon / JAUBERT Tom

Graphs : COURTOIS Clément / OUZAGUA Nassim / ABRIAL Marion
